message.name: ERR_WIZARD_SCHEMA_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: Wizard Schema Not Found.Please contact the Administrator!

message.name: ERR_PRODUCT_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: Product Not Found. Please contact the Administrator!

message.name: ERR_PRODUCT_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: Product Name '%1s' already exists.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCT_TYPE_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: Product Type '%1s' already exists.

message.name: ERR_ELIGIBLE_PARTICIPANT_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: At least one 'Eligible Participant Type' must be selected.

message.name: ERR_OTHER_PRODUCT_TYPE_NOT_SPECIFIED
message.locale: New Product Type must be specified only when Product Type is 'Other'.

message.name: ERR_INVALID_PRODUCT_TYPE
message.locale: New Product Type cannot be %1s.

message.name: ERR_INVALID_DETERMINATION_COMP_STRATEGY
message.locale: The Determination Comparison Strategy must be selected.

message.name: ERR_INVALID_INTERVAL_SUMMERIZER_STRATEGY
message.locale: The Decision Summary Display Strategy must be valid.

message.name: ERR_START_DATE_AFTER_ENDDATE
message.locale: 'Start Date' must be on or before the End Date.

message.name: ERR_END_DATE_BEFORE_STARTDATE
message.locale: 'End Date' must be on or after the Start Date.

message.name: ERR_START_DATE_BEFORE_TODAY
message.locale: 'Start Date' must be on or after today.

message.name: ERR_START_DATE_BEFORE_PRODUCT_START_DATE
message.locale: The Start Date must not be earlier than Product Start Date.

message.name: ERR_START_DATE_IS_EMPTY
message.locale: The start date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_END_DATE_IS_EMPTY
message.locale: The end date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FROM_DATE_IS_EMPTY
message.locale: The from date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_START_DATE_AFTER_END_DATE
message.locale: Start date must not be later than the end date.

message.name: BY_MESSAGE
message.locale: by

message.name: PRODUCT_TYPE_OTHER
message.locale: Other

message.name: PRODUCT_TYPE_BENEFIT
message.locale: Benefit

message.name: PRODUCT_TYPE_LIABILITY
message.locale: Liability

message.name: ERR_OFFSET_IS_NEGATIVE
message.locale: Offset must not have negative value.

message.name: ERR_ESTIMATED_COST_IS_NEGATIVE
message.locale: Estimated Cost must not have negative value.

message.name: ERR_COST_IS_NEGATIVE
message.locale: Cost must not have negative value.

message.name: ERR_FROM_DATE_BEFORE_TODAY
message.locale: 'From Date' must on or after today.

message.name: ERR_FV_DELIVERY_METHOD_FV_PRODUCT_TYPE
message.locale: The Delivery Method - %1s is not applicable to %2s product.

message.name: ERR_FV_BILLING_METHOD_FV_PRODUCT_TYPE
message.locale: The Billing Method - %1s is not applicable to %2s product.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCT_PROVIDER_EMPTY
message.locale: 'Product Provider' must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCT_PROVIDER_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: Product Provider not found.Please contact the Administrator!

message.name: ERR_PROVIDER_LOCATION_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: Provider Location not found.Please contact the Administrator!

message.name: ERR_PROVISIONLOCATION_FV_STARTDATE_PROVLOCATION
message.locale: The start date must not be before the provider location start date.

message.name: ERR_PROVISIONLOCATION_FV_ENDDATE_PRODPROVISION
message.locale: The end date must not be later than the product provision end date.

message.name: ERR_PROVISIONLOCATION_XRV_ENDDATE_NOT_MATCH_EARLIEST
message.locale: The end date must be before 'Product Provision' and 'Provider Location' end date.

message.name: ERR_PROVISIONLOCATION_FV_NO_ENDDATE_STARTDATE_PRODPROVISION
message.locale: The start date must not be after the product provision end date.

message.name: ERR_PROVISIONLOCATION_FV_NO_ENDDATE_STARTDATE_PROVLOCATION
message.locale: The start date must not be after the provider location end date.

message.name: ERR_PROVISIONLOCATION_FV_ENDDATE_PROVLOCATION
message.locale: The end date must not be later than the provider location end date.

message.name: ERR_PROVISIONLOCATION_FV_STARTDATE_PRODPROVISION
message.locale: 'Start Date' must be on or after Product Provision Start Date.

message.name: ERR_MIN_DEDUCTION_AMOUNT_NEGATIVE
message.locale: Negative Value must not be entered in 'Minimum Deduction Amount'.

message.name: ERR_FIXED_COST_FV_NEGATIVE
message.locale: Negative Value must not be entered in 'Fixed Cost'.

message.name: ERR_MIN_PAYMENT_AMOUNT_NEGATIVE
message.locale: Minimum Payment Amount must not have negative value.

message.name: ERR_DELIVERY_MAX_PERIOD_NEGATIVE
message.locale: Negative Value must not be entered in 'Maximum Delivery Period'.

message.name: ERR_MAX_DEDUCTION_RATE_IS_NEGATIVE
message.locale: Negative Value must not be entered in 'Maximum Deduction Rate'.

message.name: ERR_MAX_AMOUNT_IS_NEGATIVE
message.locale: Negative Value must not be entered in 'Maximum Amount'.

message.name: ERR_MAX_DEDUCTION_RATE_NEGATIVE
message.locale: Negative Value must not be entered in 'Maximum Amount'.

message.name: ERR_GRACE_PERIOD_NEGATIVE
message.locale: Negative Value must not be entered in 'Grace Period'.

message.name: ERR_MAX_RATE_EXCEEDED
message.locale: 'Maximum Deduction Rate' must be less than or equal to 100.

message.name: ERR_MAX_PRODUCT_RECORDS
message.locale: The maximum allowed number of Dynamic Product %1n is reached.

message.name: ERR_UNABLE_TO_GENERATE_PRODUCT_CODE
message.locale: Unable to generate unique product code for Product %1s. Please try again!

message.name: ERR_RESTRICTED_PRODUCT_TYPE
message.locale: Please select a valid Product Type.

message.name: ERR_SPECIFY_PRODUCT_TYPE_IS_OTHER
message.locale: New Product Type must be specified when a Product Type is 'Other'.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCT_TYPE_CODE_PREFIX_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The Product Type Code prefix %1s is too long. Maximum allowed is %2n characters.

message.name: ERR_UNABLE_TO_GENERATE_PRODUCT_TYPE_CODE_TRY_AGAIN
message.locale: Unable to generate unique product type code for product type %1s. Please try again!

message.name: ERR_UNABLE_TO_GENERATE_PRODUCT_TYPE_CODE_CRITICAL
message.locale: Unable to generate unique product type code for product type %1s. Please contact the Administrator!

message.name: LOG_MAX_GENERATED_PRODUCT_TYPE_CODE
message.locale: The generated product type code maximum %1n is reached.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCT_NAME_CODE_PREFIX_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The Product Name Code prefix %1s is too long. Maximum allowed is %2n characters.

message.name: ERR_UNABLE_TO_GENERATE_PRODUCT_NAME_CODE_TRY_AGAIN
message.locale: Unable to generate unique product name code for product name %1s. Please try again!

message.name: ERR_UNABLE_TO_GENERATE_PRODUCT_NAME_CODE_CRITICAL
message.locale: Unable to generate unique product name code for product name %1s. Please contact the Administrator!

message.name: LOG_MAX_GENERATED_PRODUCT_NAME_CODE
message.locale: The generated product name code maximum %1n is reached.

message.name: ERR_FV_INVALID_RULE_SET_NAME
message.locale: The rule set name entered is invalid. The rule set name must match the pattern specified in the rule set schema.

message.name: DEFAULT_PRODUCT_PERIOD_NAME
message.locale: Custom product period

message.name: ERR_INVALID_REASSESSMENT_STRATEGY
message.locale: The Reassessment Strategy must be selected.
